prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a spiky shell and vibrant blue colors.

Design a Pokemon that has a bulky shape, perfect for underwater battles.
Generate a creature with a combination of dangerous spikes and alluring colors.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in oceanic environments and has a menacing appearance.
